name: Preparations
description:
a small game about making sure your friends eat well during finals week. 

it is easy to feel aimless in one's early 20s. it does not help that you are the only one in the house not in school. you often dream about doing something important, something that matters...

made in february 2021 
for BitsyJam: Fruits and Veggies
for Prof. Rankin's
Tiny Games course.
